description: Correspondence validation against established AI benchmarks using actual experimental results from SpiralBrain v3.0 development

copa_commonsense_reasoning.interpretation: Demonstrates regulatory capacity for causal reasoning without learning mechanisms

crypto_market_analysis.interpretation: Perfect regulatory performance on real-world financial tasks

crypto_tax_classification.interpretation: Brain-driven transaction analysis without algorithmic classification

homeostasis_multi_pathway.interpretation: Stable operation without regulatory interventions under test conditions

emotional_processing_accuracy.interpretation: Functional emotional processing capabilities across multiple domains

cognitive_stability_probe.interpretation: Stable emotional processing without degradation over trials

validation_notes.correspondence_principle: Same datasets as traditional AI systems for direct comparison
validation_notes.regulatory_focus: Metrics demonstrate internal stability rather than performance optimization
validation_notes.non_learning_boundary: All results achieved without training, memory, or adaptation
validation_notes.data_source: Actual experimental results from SpiralBrain v3.0 development repository
